title: How to Tame and Breed a Dog on Minecraft

steps.title: Obtain bones.
steps.content: Obtain bones. Bones are dropped by skeletons and wither skeletons when they are defeated. They can also be obtained from chests in desert and jungle temples or caught while fishing. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Find a wolf.
steps.content: Find a wolf. They spawn in the Forest, Taiga, Mega Taiga, Cold Taiga, and Cold Taiga M biomes. If you are in creative mode, you can also spawn one using a wolf spawn egg. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Use the bones to tame the wolf.
steps.content: Use the bones to tame the wolf. Open your inventory and drag and drop the bones into your inventory. Select the bones by pressing the corresponding button on the keyboard, or pressing the left and right shoulder buttons on the controller until the toolbar slot with the bones is highlighted. Walk up to the wolf and right-click on it or press the left trigger button on the controller to give it bones. You will know the wolf has been tamed when hearts appear over it and it's collar will turn red. [3] X Research source It may take multiple tries and will consume your bone. After you tame it, you can make the dog either sit or follow you by right-clicking on it. When it is tamed, it will be sitting by default. You will have to right-click it to get it to follow you.

steps.title: Tame a second wolf.
steps.content: Tame a second wolf. You need two for breeding. Use bones to tame a second wolf. [4] X Research source In Minecraft, animals, villagers and mobs don't have a gender. Don't worry about whether or not the wolves are male or female.

steps.title: Feed the dogs to put them in love mode.
steps.content: Feed the dogs to put them in love mode. Make sure both dogs are nearby. Feed them any kind of meat to make them go into love mode. You will see hearts appear above the dog. When two dogs go into love mode in close proximity, they will breed on their own and produce a pup. [5] X Research source A new pup bred by tamed dogs will already be tamed and friendly to the player. A pup will start small and grow over time. You can make it grow quicker by feeding it meat.
